i-angle: Isikhala esiphakathi kwemigqa emibili noma izindiza eziphambanayo
i-radian: Iyunithi ye-engeli yendiza elingana ne-engeli emaphakathi nendilinga incishiswe i-arc elingana nobude nerediyasi
sine: Isilinganiso sobude bohlangothi oluphambene ne-engeli enikeziwe kuya kubude be-hypotenuse kanxantathu ole kwesokudla
cosine: Isilinganiso sohlangothi oluseduze ne-hypotenuse kanxantathu ole kwesokudla
tangent: Umugqa othinta ijika endaweni eyodwa kuphela
secant: Umugqa oqondile onqamula ijika emaphoyintini amabili noma ngaphezulu
i-pythagorean theorem: Ubudlelwano obuyisisekelo ku-Euclidean geometry phakathi kwezinhlangothi ezintathu zikanxantathu ongakwesokudla
umsebenzi ngezikhathi ezithile: Umsebenzi ophinda amanani awo ngezikhathi ezithile noma ngezikhathi
ubukhulu: Ubukhulu bokususwa endaweni noma ibanga elihanjiswe iphoyinti emzimbeni odlidlizayo noma igagasi
isilinganiso se-degree: Isilinganiso se-engeli ngamadigri, lapho indilinga egcwele ihlukaniswa ngamadigri angu-360
